p: Film thickness of the Si-based anode materials (Si and Si 3N 4) was measured by topography. The thickness of the Si film after a 1-h deposition time was estimated to be 124.9 nm, as shown in Figure 7a. Si was deposited on Cu using RF sputtering for 6 h, which gave an overall thickness of 749.4 nm. The approximate thickness of the Si 3N 4 film after a 1-h deposition was 54.8 nm ( Figure 7b). Based on these values, the estimated thickness of the bilayer film (Si 3N 4@Si) was 804.2 nm.
